security: Sharing that the NSA is intercepting and disseminating diplomatic communications from Italy concerning reactions to the JFK assassination could damage relations with Italy.
summary: An NSA report from December 1963 details reactions in Cairo and the Arab world to President Kennedy's assassination, noting a trend of blaming Zionism due to Lee Harvey Oswald's alleged Hebrew-Polish origins.
summary_one_paragraph: This Top Secret UMBRA report, originating from the NSA on December 17, 1963, and disseminated to HCF [R], addresses the emerging anti-Zionist sentiment in Syria following President Kennedy's assassination. Citing a Cairo press reaction to Lee Harvey Oswald's alleged Hebrew-Polish origin, the report indicates a tendency among some Arab extremists to accuse Zionism of involvement in the assassination, despite a lack of concrete evidence. The report, translated from Italian diplomatic communications, highlights concerns about this development and its potential impact on Arab-Zionist relations, promising a more detailed follow-up.
title: 3/0/ITD/T3747-63: PRESIDENT KENNEDY'S DEATH NEW BASIS FOR ANTI-ZION [R]
conspiracy: The report notes that 'the circumstance that the killer of OSWALD is of Hebrew-Polish origin has now caused a notable part of the Cairo press to move in the (5G) that Zionism (13G/M) to this whole tragedy,' indicating a reaction to the assassination that attempts to link it to a conspiracy involving Zionism. The report does not contain any evidence that Zionism was actually involved, but only refers to that theory being floated in the Arab world.
